Videos are too short, just syntax details & one example. A little bit introduction about the feature plus the implementation details would be plus for this course. 
For Instructor: Lesson 15 should be before 14, callbacks should be introduced before promises. Lesson 14 starts with promise and code from Lesson 15 is shown there I think a little re-arrangement is required.
results.content_html:
Videos are too short, just syntax details & one example. A little bit introduction about the feature plus the implementation details would be plus for this course.
For Instructor: Lesson 15 should be before 14, callbacks should be introduced before promises. Lesson 14 starts with promise and code from Lesson 15 is shown there I think a little re-arrangement is required.
